title: Up-Pointing Red Triangle

adjectives: Being or moving higher in position or greater in some value; being above a former position or level
Extending or moving toward a higher place
Moving up, directed toward a higher place.

description: A small red equilateral triangle, pointing upwards.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the red triangle pointed up is a bold and striking geometric shape with a rich, saturated red color and a pronounced 3D appearance, thanks to Apple's masterful use of glossy shading and realistic lighting. Its sharp point and smooth surfaces communicate a sense of direction, caution, or an alert, often used to draw attention to important information or a warning.
